entry.title: Memory leaks?
entry.summary: According to recent spam, the transaction size is about 15 kB each. However, the total memory used by bitcoind process was unexpectedly high, which led to a query about the memory usage of Task Manager for the bitcoin process both today and tomorrow. The email also includes information on the size and bytes of transactions. The author requests clarification on whether the unlikely 15 kB per transaction figure is correct, as it would result in almost 16 million divided by 1085 transactions if true.
